title: Featherlite Flip Computer Table
description: The Flip Table is designed to make sure your work life doesn’t interfere with your home life. Easily Foldable and portable, the Flip Table ensures that no space is wasted, and allows you to transform your home space to a workspace and vice versa, quickly and easily. It comes with thanasu maple tabletop (18mm particle board), dark grey MS powder coated structure, foldable when not in use, 50mm castors for easy mobility, levelers adjustable up to 15 mm and shelf for additional storage.

title: Gary Kids Trundle Bed With Storage
description: 1. Gary trundle bed can be the multi-starrer in your room with its multiple features. This bed consists of a broad trundle below while it also has two drawers that are more useful. Finally, the design of it has an ever-lasting impact in the room. 2. The Sheesham wood making makes it much durable furniture. ​3. Click to know more about the numerous finishes available.

title: Retica Wall Shelf
description: 1. Bring a new era of décor in your home with the Retica wall shelf to serve stunning beauty and functionality. It has a combination of the finest wooden planks for bold confidence that is hard to find. This expertly crafted wall shelf features ten shelves to organize your essentials. 2. Crafted from Sheesham wood to impart sturdiness and long-lastingness. ​3. Smooth and stunning finish options to fit in every style of interiors.

title: Vesta Coffee Table
description: 1. Vesta coffee table is a perfect combination of storage in style. It has three shelves at one side and it is further segmented with a panel below the table. Not just the table, but Vesta also has four small pouffes aligned with upholstered seats.2. This coffee table and pouffes are made in sheesham wood. The seats are upholstered. ​3. There are three finish options of honey, teak and walnut and the upholstered seat is in cream blossom fabric.

title: Hamilton Nested Stools
description: 1.Perfect to optimise space in the house, keep them folded into 1 and when you need 3 stools, voila! 2.Extremely versatile, can be used as stool(s), centre table(s) , side table(s), small study table + stool for children

title: Induscraft Sheesham Wood
description: 1.Total seating capacity is 4. 2.Oval shaped dining table. 3.Table (W x H x D): 129 cm x 76 cm x 93 cm (4 ft 2 in x 2 ft 5 in x 3 ft).
